title: Percy Hanger
text:
Percy Kemshed Hanger (1889–1939) was an English professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="centre%20half">centre half</a> who played in the <a href="the%20Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Leicester%20Fosse%20F.C.">Leicester Fosse</a>.
Personal life.
Hanger's brother <a href="Harry%20Hanger">Harry</a> was also a footballer.
